column1: The terms First Age of the Sun and Ages of the Sun are commonly used by many fans
column2: but do not appear anywhere in Tolkiens writings. The First Age of the Sun in this conception is held to begin with the first rising of the Sun and continue until Morgoths defeat nearly 600 years later. While this is at odds with Tolkiens statements that the first age was the longest by far it is a common misapprehension because the subsequent ages all took place entirely during the Years of the Sun.
